Description:
QUIETLY POSITIONED ON A GENEROUS BLOCK
In a court like position adjoining parkland, this home on a generous block holds plenty of appeal for first home buyers, young families and investors. In good condition the home features a classic brick fa√ßade and covered front patio and inside you find polished hardwood floors gracing the lounge room that is accompanied by a family/meals area and a modern kitchen with electric cook top plus a stainless oven and dishwasher. There are 3 robed bedrooms including the master with a walk in wardrobe and a semi ensuite plus a family bathroom and a study or fourth bedroom. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling provide additional comfort while outside you find a massive backyard, a garden shed and single carport. Right near Clayton South Primary School and buses the home is also just minutes away from Clarinda Shopping Centre and central Clayton.
Insights: 1 Kitson Road, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2015 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Dreams do Come True - Under Contract
With it's own street frontage, private driveway and two courtyards, this single level beauty offers modern living for budget buyers. This great home features large living room opening to kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances and family meals area, conveniently overlooking one of the fully paved courtyards.
The property also comprises 2 good sized bedrooms, both with BIR's, extra large bathroom and separate toilet, second spacious courtyard and heating and cooling.
All this within close proximity to Clayton Shops, Train Station, Monash Medical Centre, Monash University and local schools.
Insights: 48 other 2 bedroom unit in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Make Your Money on Mallawa!
Whether you are an investor or builder or a buyer looking for a house to call a home, it's easy to see you are onto a winner with this one. Knock it down, build multi town houses, keep the front and build at the back...or just live in and enjoy what the property has already got to offer.
With beautiful family friendly surroundings make this property a joy to own or to invest in. With parkland's, local primary/secondary schools nearby and all of Clayton's/Clayton South's preferred facilities within a short walking distance.
With some recent sales in Clayton South hitting the magic million, don't be surprised if one day this pocket joins this exclusive club. You can wait or buy now while it's still relatively affordable.
Special Features:
3/4 bedrooms (potential for 5th if you are chasing the big rental return)
2 bathrooms (separate shower and bath)
Large North facing backyard big enough to accommodate a second dwelling (STCA)
Wide driveway over 3 metres
In relatively good condition but room for improvements or to add further value
Dual Occ potential or Multi Unit Site (STCA)
Land size 700m2 (15.2m x 46m)
A good honest property with lots and lots and lots and lots of potential.
Insights: 25 Mallawa Street, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2015 and 27 other 4 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
***UNDER OFFER***
Kick back, relax and start with a view to the playing fields... or play with the potential to extend your lifestyle in this well-located approx. 5,834.04sqft/542sqm property! Situated opposite Clayton South Primary School with a wide open playing-field view, this charming three bedroom home offers a great start to life on your own full-sized family block.
Featuring airy open plan living/dining separated from a sophisticated timber benchtop and stainless-steel appliance kitchen by a dining-sized island bench, this accommodating home stars a stylishly updated bathroom with handy separate WC and fan-cooled robe-fitted bedrooms including a vast master.
Move in, relax and enjoy gas-heated, air-conditioned comfort with covered outdoor spaces front and rear and plentiful parking including a secure garage. There's endless space to let the kids play around in full family-sized tank-water gardens.
Alternatively, play with the potential to extend to capitalize on this in-demand family location with the park at the end of the street and the school at the door!
Paul Mizerni : 0410 844 955
Insights: 12 Narrumburn Road, CLAYTON SOUTH VIC 3169 was last sold in 2015 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in CLAYTON SOUTH have recently been sold.

Description:
Stunning in every way
Clayton South's reputation for lifestyle appeal and investment is widely known and well deserved. Located within easy reach of Monash University, Monash Medical Centre and all public/private amenities, this single level unit set towards the rear captivates the senses with natural elements throughout providing a compelling option for young professionals, investors and empty nesters looking to downsize. A no-expense spared renovation is epitomised by its sizeable lounge leading to the superb kitchen with stainless steel appliances adjoined by a separate meals area overlooking an enchanting rear courtyard defined by low maintenance ease. Furthermore 2 generous sized bedrooms complete with BIR's sharing a sublime central Bathroom as well as ducted heating, air conditioning as well as a SLUG, will surely impress even the most discerning of buyers.
Insights: 9/563 Clayton Road, CLAYTON SOUTH VIC 3169 was last sold in 2009 and 48 other 2 bedroom unit in CLAYTON SOUTH have recently been sold.

Description:
PERFECTLY PRESENTED & LOCATED 3 BEDROOM TOWNHOUSE
Directly opposite Westall Secondary College, this street front townhouse provides a relaxed lifestyle with the added convenience of having shops, buses and Westall train station only minutes away. With style, space and impeccable presentation, it will surely appeal to occupiers seeking a low maintenance lifestyle and investors chasing returns and great growth potential. It features a generous lounge/dining room with tiled floors plus a beautiful kitchen with stone benches, glass splash backs and stainless appliances. There are 3 robed bedrooms upstairs including the master with an ensuite that matches the family bathroom and additional powder room downstairs. Ducted heating and refrigerated air conditioning provide perfect comfort and there's also a north facing courtyard with paved patio and water tank plumbed to the toilets and a double garage with remote controlled door accessed via the rear laneway.
Insights: 69 Rosebank Avenue, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2015 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Spacious & Modern Elegance in Highly Prized Location!
This is a rare chance to secure a home that is both spacious and elegant in a Clayton Central Locale. Featuring high quality fittings throughout, further complemented by 9ft ceilings and large spacious bedrooms. Walk to Shops, Local Schools and Clayton Train Station or take your families and friends to Namatjira Reserve nearby for a lovely picnic in a family friendly atmosphere. With Monash Uni, Medical Centre, New Children's Hospital and the soon to be open CostCo only minutes away, make this a smart investment or for those looking for a beautiful home in an unbeatable location.
Special Features:
- 21 Squares of Pure Luxury (230m2 of land)
- 4 large bedrooms, master with WIR and his/hers shower
- 6 Star Energy Rated with LED Lights
- 3 bathrooms (1 downstairs, 2 upstairs) 3 toilets
- Top Quality European appliances and stone benches throughout
- Ducted heating and cooling
- Alarm system and video intercom
- Remote garage with internal access
- Private yard perfect for a decking or a BBQ area.
Many upgraded features, making this property a little extra special.
So many more desirable features that must be seen...an inspection will impress!!!
NB: Photo ID required at all inspections.
Insights: 1 Frank Avenue, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2015 and 27 other 4 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Large Block, Perfect for Multi-Unit Development!
Builders and Developers take a look at this great opportunity! This massive 887sqm (approx) of land is perfectly suitable to re-develop into multiple units (STCA). The home is situated in close proximity to the Westall Train Station, Westall Secondary College, local shopping strip, Clayton Train Station, and only minutes away from Monash University and Monash Medical Centre.
The current home is an original, 3 bedroom post war home, perfectly rentable and does additionally offer the bones to create a family home on a large parcel.
With high re-sale values in the area and plenty of other development, this is a must buy!
Land Dimensions 20.5m x 43.5m = 887sqm (approx)
in conj, Brian Capp Property Advocate 0418 500 483

Description:
RENOVATED
Privacy, security and convenient location these are the words that first come to mind when you inspect this property. Fully renovated this beautifully presented home is ideally located in a leafy, quiet street in Clayton South.
Sitting behind a high front fence and on a rectangle block of 531m2 (approximately) this 3 bedrooms, brick veneer home has a family-friendly open floor plan that will provide you with warmth and comfort for many years to come.
A large modern kitchen with gas cook top and timber cabinet offers a simple flow to dining area which further flows to the lounge room.
Offering fresh paint throughout, this friendly home has a separate toilet and another toilet in the fully renovated bathroom.
You can fit four cars in the car port. Close the gate and let the children play inside the court yard or back yard there are plenty of room to move.
Conveniently located, this property is closed to Clayton shops, Springvale shopping centre and the newly established Springvale Home Maker Centre (Ikea). With easy access to Westall road extension and Dandenong road, going to the city is a breeze.
Insights: 39 Monash Cres, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2015 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Calling All Investors
If you are looking for a solid investment, you can't go past this delightful double-storey beauty. You will be spoilt by the open spaces and low maintenance living, together with the nearby amenities. You also have the advantage of securing a fixed lease term at $390 per week until April, 2016.
Attributes include 2 bedrooms, master with ensuite, central bathroom, powder room, upper-level living room, modern open-plan kitchen boasting SS appliances, large dining area and balcony.
Further features include reverse cycle air-conditioning and remote control security parking.
Situated within walking distance to shops, Keeley Park, Clayton railway station and within close proximity to Monash University, Princess Highway and Huntingdale Golf Club.
Tony Kwan 0422 876 886
Alvin Lam 0488 868 931
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS
PLEASE NOTE: Open for Inspection Times and Property Availability is subject to change or cancellation without notice. Melway Ref 79D4

Description:
Buy a Home at Budget Value!
Located in a quite & convenient pocket of Clayton South, this gorgeous, triple-fronted brick veneer residence suiting all home buyers & investors offers tranquil living and a fresh lifestyle. With an allotment of over 310sqm, you'll be surprised by the size & flexibility it offers. Comprising of:
- 3 bedrooms, 2 w/BIR
- Spacious & bright living area
- Separate Dining Room
- Updated bathroom & separate toilet
- Ducted Heating & Air conditioning units
- Well equipped kitchen w/gas stove
- Double carport, huge yard both front & back
- Up to $380 per week rental
In close vicinity to Westall secondary college, bus transport, Westall train station and Springvale shopping, this is surrounded by all you need. Get your foot in the door before it's too late!

Description:
Clayton Central, Double Corner Block, Prime Land 1523m2
This is a once in a lifetime opportunity to secure a large corner block in Clayton South's finest location. It would have to be an area equal to any of Clayton's finest streets.
Why you ask? Well, beautiful street scape, walk to all the local specialty shops, Clayton Central, Clayton Station, Monash Library and Aquatic Centre.....and more importantly for developers/builders, easy and high resell at price equivalent to Clayton*
Why Should You Buy????
1523m2 (37m x 42m) approx.
Potential 6-8 T/houses (STCA)
Apartments 18-24 Apartments (STCA)
Resale of T/Houses ($620 000-$720 000)* 3/4 Bedrooms
Resale of Apartments ($350 000-$420 000)* 2 Bedrooms
An area, in my opinion that has much more to grow and will catch up to Clayton's price.
Flow on effect from Neighbouring Suburbs and are now on overseas buyers radar.
If you are still not sure......speak with me or look into the area yourself.....I am sure you will see what I see!!!!!

Description:
Another Quality Property Sold by Byron Sweerts - Harcourts
Spacious Townhouse - Ideal Investment
This 4 bedroom townhouse provides the space of a double storey home yet the convenience of a low maintenance and convenient block size and presents as an ideal opportunity for a first home buyer, young family or investor.
In immaculate condition, the home features an open plan kitchen overlooking a generously sized meals area and you will enjoy the open dining and lounge area with polished timber floorboards throughout. There is a downstairs study which could be used as the fourth bedroom, a powder room, internal access from the double garage, ducted heating and evaporative cooling.
Upstairs offers 3 bedrooms with the master coming complete with ensuite and walk in robe and there is also a retreat area which is an ideal third living space for kids.
The home is further topped off with a paved outdoor area overlooking a low maintenance backyard and the location has you only minutes away from Monash University, two train stations, shops and multiple schools in the area.

Description:
Single Level Distinction Free From Compromise!
Stylish serenity and carefree charm define this immensely appealing single-level home, peacefully residing beyond a generous garden frontage and leaving nothing to do but enjoy easy access to local transport, schools, shops, Monash Medical Centre, Clayton or Huntingdale train station (Zone 1), Monash University and Monash Freeway. A modern rendered facade and floorboard floors introduce comfortable spaces with an inviting living room flowing through to a beautifully updated kitchen and meals area. Tastefully renovated throughout, 2 bedrooms (main with ensuite) and a mosaic tiled bathroom are enhanced by gas heating, split system AC, alarm, compact rear garden and secure single remote carport providing optimum comfort to this excellent first home, easy-care downsize or astute investment.
PHOTO 'ID' MUST BE PROVIDED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS AND PHONE NUMBER WITH ALL ENQUIRIES

Description:
Vendor Keen to Commence Building - Under Offer
Buy now, before other buyers discover why this pocket of Clayton South is one of the best areas to buy if you are looking for convenience, value and strong potential for future growth.
Set on a generous allotment and no common driveway, make this a perfect buy for both investors and home buyers looking for a modern lifestyle whilst not sacrificing on space and privacy.
Easy walking distance to public transport (bus/train), with Monash University/Medical Centre, Clayton Central and Ikea Maker Centre a stone throw away.
Call for further information and a list of inclusions...
Special Features:
3 Bedrooms, potential for 4th
Master with ensuite downstairs
2 living areas
Separate driveway with no common area
Land area 400m2 approximate
Building area 170m2 approximate

Description:
Keep The Front And Develop The Rear (STCA)!
Standing on a flat 668sqm (approx.) corner block, future success is all but guaranteed with this well-presented home that's rich in potential. With the future owner granted the rare opportunity to retain the current dwelling, subdivide the allotment and develop the rear (STCA), it's an opportunity too good to refuse.
The home itself is defined by its contemporary appeal, made possible by the presence of polished timber floorboards, which flow beneath the high ceilings and reflect the abundant natural light that fills the home, creating an ambience that's warm and inviting.
Lounge on entry is generous in size and enjoys a front garden outlook, while an open kitchen is also spacious in nature and offers a worthy stage for the cook of the household to show off their culinary skills.
Three good-sized bedrooms provide plenty of comfort, while a large backyard is big enough to comfortably accommodate a brand new Townhouse with its own frontage (STCA).
This appealing home is conveniently located within a very short distance of Clayton Shopping Centre, scenic parkland, Clayton train station, bus services, Monash University, Monash Medical Centre and well-regarded schools.

Description:
Large 2 storey townhouse
With its own street frontage, private driveway to large auto garage and direct entry into the home this property offers excellent accommodation. The home also features a large entrance foyer, powederroom, separate laundry, spacious kitchen with stone benchtops and stainless steel appliances overlooking a large family room, 3 large bedrooms (BIR's), main with ensuite and WIR plus separate study. With heating/cooling and a large rear garden this home will not disappoint.
